#%Name: Nontronite NAu-1
#%formula: 
#%Mineral class: silicates
#%Xtal system: monoclinic
#%Edge: K
#%Sample prep: Suspended in DI water for 1hr, decanted supernatant and discarded what settles.  Let it settle 24hrs, decanted supernatant and centrifuged it.  This removed large particles leaving clay.  Mounted between 2 layers of kapton tape
#%Beamline: ALS 10.3.2, HxV slits = 200x20 um
#%Det:  I0=N2, Fluorescence mode (Ge solid state 7elts)
#%Ref/notes:  from the Clay Minerals Society. XRD confirmed. average of several dat scans
#%Temp: Room temp (28 degC)
#%Time&date: 9:30 PM 12/14/2011. Matthew A. Marcus
#%============================================================
